item.title: My Resume
item.description: Grant Duval 1461 Ridge Way grantduval@gmail.com Los Angeles, CA 90026 415-928-9380 Education 2008-2011 BS, Business Administration - Information Systems Management; San Francisco State University Work Highlights April 2018 - Present Platform Engineer:: Core Scientific Proactively identifying ways to improve and make technology more reliable Operating and maintaining AWS and on-prem infrastructure. Working to automate the provisioning, configuration, scaling, and monitoring of our infrastructure Building CI/CD pipelines and DevOps tooling Plan for the growth of infrastructure July 2014 - June 2017 IT Specialist:: Ripple
